document_data.name: Stoneshoulder
document_data.mainbody: The '''Stoneshoulders''' were a [[dwarf]] clan of [[northwest Faer√ªn]] and in the city of [[Iltkazar]] in [[Shanatar]].
document_data.Members:
* [[Iirikos Stoneshoulder]], a famed artisan and architect of [[Ammarindar (kingdom)|Ammarindar]] around the 2{{nd}} century [[DR]].
* [[Bettargh Stoneshoulder]], high priest of [[Dugmaren Brightmantle]] in Iltkazar in the late 1300s [[DR]].
* [[Dunnabar Stoneshoulder]], high priest of [[Gorm Gulthyn]] in Iltkazar in the late 1300s [[DR]].
document_data.Bases: * The [[Hall of Stoneshoulder]], a guild hall in Iltkazar dedicated to martial training.
